page.sliderText: Get inspired and make your art better.

generate.title: Idea generation
generate.slogan: Generate your first idea right now
generate.descriptionTwo: Pick a category below or just generate a random idea.

portrait.title: Portrait
portrait.description: Capture the essence of a person on paper

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.description: Bring buildings and structures to life with intricate details

cyberpunk.title: Cyberpunk
cyberpunk.description: Dive into a neon-drenched future filled with technology

adoptables.title: Adoptables
adoptables.description: Create unique characters waiting to find their forever homes

humanization.title: Humanization
humanization.description: Give inanimate objects and concepts a human touch

anatomy.title: Anatomy
anatomy.description: Explore the intricacies of the human (or animal) form

mythology.title: Mythology
mythology.description: Illustrate the legends and lore of ancient cultures

furry.title: Furry
furry.description: Unleash your creativity with anthropomorphic animal characters

animals.title: Animals
animals.description: Celebrate the beauty and diversity of the animal kingdom

fashion.title: Fashion
fashion.description: Design cutting-edge outfits and stylish ensembles

anime.title: Anime
anime.description: Embrace the dynamic and expressive world of Japanese animation
